ygData.messageBody:
Hi! My name is Abbalar, and I'm a 20'th level wood elf bard on Fennin Ro. I've been lurking for a while until I came up with something useful to post, but that last patch message on the test server piqued my interest. I'll repost the bard changes here:

Fufil's Curtailing Chant now works on monsters.
Tuyen's Songs have had their damage increased.
New Bard Songs have been added to vendors.

I'm not high enough to comment on this, but many other people are :) Can anyone who plays on the test server confirm exactly what the new songs (and changes) are?

Also, when I got the invisibility song, I noticed a very interesting thing- the minotaur horn works with it (i.e., it acts as both brass and wind.) Is this a bug? I LOVE this- it saves me one of the precious inventory slots- but I doubt it's intentional.

Thanks!

Abbalar
